message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I think you'll find it's a very good deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,500. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
